info.name: Adam Giese
info.summary: With seven years of Web Developer experience, I have been focusing on front-end and WordPress development for the last three years.

experience.title: Senior Web Developer
responsibilities: Creation of single page application using KnockoutJS
Creation of web applications using VueJS
Integrating with external APIs such as Facebook, PayPal, and Google Maps.
Creation of responsive WordPress themes from PSDs.
Creation of custom functionality with WordPress plugins.
Creation of time estimations for upcoming and prospective projects.
Creation of new agency processes, including Git, website monitoring, and the usage of new tools such as Sass.
Writing technical blog entries and leading Lunch & Learns.

experience.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Creation of learning management system using AngularJS
Participating with a team in the creation of a web-based learning management system.
Installation & configuration of WordPress eCommerce plugins.
